title: Limitations on Commercial Activity
content:
Limitations on Commercial Activity

State Regulations
§ 1260.5 - Permission to use terminal conditional
§ 1260.6 - Unauthorized commercial activity prohibited
§ 1260.7 - Permission to conduct sightseeing flights required
§ 1260.8 - Unauthorized storage of cargo or property prohibited; storage fees
§ 1260.9 - Unauthorized parking and storage of aircraft prohibited
§ 1260.10 - Unauthorized use or occupancy of operational area prohibited
§ 1260.11 - Use of public aircraft facilities conditioned upon payment of prescribed fees
§ 1260.12 - Charges for use of terminal to be paid in cash; exceptions
§ 1260.13 - Permission to post or distribute printed matter required
§ 1260.14 - Permission for solicitation of funds required
§ 1260.15 - Unauthorized commercial activity, entertainment and solicitation of alms prohibited

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
